GK20rmc1-3pu:307: taṃ nirūpitasamantam añjasā bhejatuḥ parisaraṃ raghūdvahau // Rc_2.42 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:309: astṛṇān navatṛṇena medināṃ rāmabhadraśayanāya lakṣmaṇaḥ // Rc_2.43 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:311: svāṃśukoddhṛtajalaṃ karābjayoḥ kauśalāc ca samavāhayat punaḥ // Rc_2.44 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:313: āmamarśa ciram aśru vartayan kevalopakaraṇena pāṇinā // Rc_2.45 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:314: svairam agrakarajair vivṛtya ca vyākulāṃ samanayaj jaṭāṭavīm /
GK20rmc1-3pu:315: aṅgadeśam anayad vidhūya ca srastarātisṛtam añcalaṃ tvacaḥ // Rc_2.46 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:316: pārśvayor upadadhe maheṣudhī ādade śirasi pūjitaṃ dhanuḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:317: unmamārja dhutasaṃhṛtena ca svāñcalena punaruktam āstaram // Rc_2.47 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:319: svaptukāma iva sālasendriyaḥ saṃviveśa raghunandanaḥ kṣaṇam // Rc_2.48 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:322: gaccha vatsa śayanīyam ātmanaḥ kliśyase kṛśataraḥ kiyac ciram /
GK20rmc1-3pu:323: nidrayā viśadatāṃ vraja kṣaṇaṃ na kṣamaḥ pratiniśīthajāgaraḥ // Rc_2.50 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:324: prātar asti bahu kṛtyam āvayor bhrātar ātmani kim asy atatparaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:325: cintyatām uṣasi tasya saṃgatiḥ śītalasya kapicakravartinaḥ // Rc_2.51 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:327: āvayoḥ samayabaddhayoḥ puno niścayārtham adhigamya eva saḥ // Rc_2.52 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:328: tad vibhātu rajanī sukhena te yāsyataḥ plavagarājamandiram /
GK20rmc1-3pu:329: pakṣayor yad anurūpamuktayos tat tadaiva ca samarthayiṣyate // Rc_2.53 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:331: adhyaśeta caraṇāmbujāntikaṃ tasya joṣam anagho jaghanyajaḥ // Rc_2.54 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:332: tatra tatra ca śayānayoś cirād vīrayor vigatasādhvasā iva /
GK20rmc1-3pu:333: uddhatair dadur ulūkahuṃkṛtair andhakārajayaghoṣaṇāṃ drumāḥ // Rc_2.55 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:335: ity ariṣṭaripukūjitais tamo dyāṃ bruvāṇam iva dūram udyayau // Rc_2.56 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:336: kevalaṃ śakunayo na nīḍagāḥ śākhino 'pi śayitāḥ samantataḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:338: na sthalī na pulinaṃ na sindhavo nācalā na taravaś cakāśire /
GK20rmc1-3pu:339: dūṣitadvitayavādam udbabhāv ekam eva timiraṃ vibhūtimat // Rc_2.58 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:340: tatra mugdhapṛṣatas tamoghane pārśvagām api mṛgīm ahārayat /
GK20rmc1-3pu:341: prāpa kokayuvatir yadṛcchayā patyur ādhitaralasya saṃgamam // Rc_2.59 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:342: vṛddham aṅkam anayac chiśubhramāc cumbati sma dayiteti yūthapam /
GK20rmc1-3pu:343: svīyam apy uditasaṃśayaḥ śanair aṅgam aṅgam amṛśad valīmukhaḥ // Rc_2.60 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:344: sarvataḥ parigateva parvatair āciteva tarubhir nirantaram /
GK20rmc1-3pu:345: āpluteva salilair itas tataḥ śakyate sma cirasaṃstutāpi bhūḥ // Rc_2.61 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:346: dikṣu dakṣam avanāv anākulaṃ khe 'tikhelam aṭavīṣu bhīṣaṇam /
GK20rmc1-3pu:347: mattam adriṣu darīṣu durjayaṃ prādurāsa viṣame samaṃ tamaḥ // Rc_2.62 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:348: bhejur aikyam iva tulyavaiśasāḥ sāyam eva malinair mukhair diśaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:349: gṛhyamāṇaśikharā tamaścayair dyauḥ papāta vasudhāsakhītale // Rc_2.63 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:350: pratyabhān na purato na pṛṣṭhataḥ pārśvayoś ca viśadaṃ na kiṃcana /
GK20rmc1-3pu:352: na dvitīyam anubhūyate sma vastv antikād api tamas tiraskṛtam /
GK20rmc1-3pu:353: kevalātmaviṣayaṃ tadābhavaj jñānam ulbaparivāsinām iva // Rc_2.65 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:355: durlabhānanavilokanāmṛtair dūyate sma mithunair mitho bhṛśam // Rc_2.66 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:357: yac cukūja bhṛśam ārtikāhalaṃ cakravākayuvatis tapasvinī // Rc_2.67 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:358: uccacāra na vanasthalīṣv asau marmaraḥ patitapatranisvanaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:361: prahvabālaviṭapāgrapāṇayas tau parītya taravaḥ siṣevire // Rc_2.69 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:362: drāṅ nidāgham anudadrajo 'dhunād viślathāṃ bṛhatikām asārayat /
GK20rmc1-3pu:364: sānujasya tamasi pramīlatas tasya bhāvimamatāhṛtā iva /
GK20rmc1-3pu:367: tenur adrivanamadhyasuptayor maṅgalāni vanadevatās tayoḥ // Rc_2.72 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:368: ehi jānaki bhujāntaraṃ kharaḥ prastaro 'yam asi kiṃ parāṅmukhī /
GK20rmc1-3pu:369: matkapolam upadhāya supyatām aprasaktir iyatī kadā nu te // Rc_2.73 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:370: kṣiptam aṃśukam idaṃ mayorasi prīyatāṃ tava nirānandaḥ stanaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:371: nīvinodini kare kuru kṣamām āyatākṣi nudasīva kiṃ punaḥ // Rc_2.74 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:374: mad bibheti virahī raghūdvaho mad vinā ca na jagat pramodate /
GK20rmc1-3pu:375: tat karomi kim itīva cintayan nojjagāma sahasā niśākaraḥ // Rc_2.76 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:376: na sma bhāti kim api sphuṭaṃ puraḥ kiṃcid īritakareṇa kevalam /
GK20rmc1-3pu:377: dṛśyate sma divi dūravartinā tarjyamānam iva kenacit tamaḥ // Rc_2.77 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:380: sānurāgam upagūḍham agrimair aṃśubhiḥ śaśabhṛto davīyasaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:381: unnanāma namucidviṣo diśi srastastaṃtamasabhāram ambaram // Rc_2.79 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:383: prekṣyate sma janitotsukaś cirād vyomaraṅgamukhasaṃmukhaḥ śaśī // Rc_2.80 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:385: mṛjyamānam iva śakradiṅmukhaṃ kuṅkumena mṛganābhoyogin // Rc_2.81 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:386: taṃ babhāra na vidhur navodayaṃ kiṃ tu kuṅkumavilepanāruṇam /
GK20rmc1-3pu:387: ekam utsukavaśāt payodharaṃ vyācakāra haridigvilāsinī // Rc_2.82 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:389: unnanāma purataḥ śaśicchalāt pūrṇarukmakalaśaḥ payonidheḥ // Rc_2.83 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:391: kṣībabhāvam iva bibhratī babhau viślathācchatimirāṃśukoccayā // Rc_2.84 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:392: nandayan bhuvanam unmukhaṃ cirān mandayan smaraviruddham udyamam /
GK20rmc1-3pu:393: krandayan virahiṇo vihaṅgamān sāndrayan pramadam indur udyayau // Rc_2.85 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:397: agrahīd uḍuvadhūkarān karair dyāṃ prasādam anayat samaṃ śasśī // Rc_2.87 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:398: ādade viyad alāñchanavrataṃ lāñchanaṃ nijam agūhad aṃśubhiḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:399: prāhiṇod apasṛtāsu kaumudīṃ dikṣu dakṣatanayāparigrahī // Rc_2.88 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:400: vyāpya dūram atha nirmalaṃ viyad vītapaṅkam iva paṅkajākaram /
GK20rmc1-3pu:402: khe kakupsu bhuvi ca kṣapāpateḥ petur ūḍhanicayā marīcayaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:403: yatra tatra kuharāṇi kānicit kampamānam aviśan niśātamaḥ // Rc_2.90 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:404: kṣiptam indurucibhir vyalambata tryambakasya śikhinaś ca diṅmukhe /
GK20rmc1-3pu:405: tatra nunnam anubandhaniḥsahaṃ kāndiśīkam iva niṣṭhitaṃ tamaḥ // Rc_2.91 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:406: kandarāṇi ca mahāmahībhṛtāṃ koṭarāṇi ca jaranmahīruhām /
GK20rmc1-3pu:407: adhyuvāsa kamalodarāṇi ca dhvāntam adhvagavadhūmukhāni ca // Rc_2.92 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:409: rāgabhaṅgam atisaṃstavād gatāṃ devarājadiśam indur atyajat // Rc_2.93 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:412: saṃkucadbhir abhirāmatādhike sādhu candramasi puṣkaraiḥ kṛtam /
GK20rmc1-3pu:413: udyatā jayini kāminīmukhe tena sāhasam anuṣṭhitaṃ punaḥ // Rc_2.95 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:414: uccakhāna ruṣam uccamaṇḍalaḥ khaṇḍanām agamayad viṣahyatām /
GK20rmc1-3pu:415: mānapaṅkam apanīya kāminīḥ kāntahastam anayan niśāpatiḥ // Rc_2.96 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:418: pīyate sma kumudaṃ na locanaiś candrikā tapati rohitacchadam /
GK20rmc1-3pu:419: prādurāsa param utpibann aliḥ saurabhaṃ niravalambam ambuni // Rc_2.98 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:421: dantamūlam asakṛc ca saṃśayād āmamarśa kariṇaḥ kareṇukā // Rc_2.99 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:425: bibhrati sma tarumūlaśāyinaḥ śambarāḥ pṛṣatayūthavibhramam // Rc_2.101 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:428: jāgarṣi kāśmari niṣīdasi kovidāra kutrāsi vatsa kṛtamāla tamāla paśya /
GK20rmc1-3pu:429: kiṃ vartate raghupater iti satvarābhir uktaṃ drumaugham avalokya vanasthalībhiḥ // Rc_2.103 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:431: udbhūtaghoravirahajvaralaṅghitasya candrātapaḥ sa khalu dāśarather apathyaḥ // Rc_2.104 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:432: kumudavanam ahetu tyaktanidraṃ tadāsīd gaganam uḍuvitānair dhig vṛthaiva praphullam /
GK20rmc1-3pu:433: ajani jagad adhīśasyāgṛhītes tadānīṃ vidhur api vidhavastrīyauvanodbhedaśocyaḥ // Rc_2.105 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:434: śvasiti janakaputrī satvaro bhānuputraḥ kapipatir upasannaṃ suprabhātaṃ taveti /
GK20rmc1-3pu:435: jagur iva raghunāthāyārdhabuddhāḥ svananto madhuram apararātre patriṇaḥ ke 'pi ke 'pi // Rc_2.106 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:436: ity abhinandakṛtau rāmacarite mahākāvye sandhyātamaścandrodayavarṇano nāma dvitīyaḥ sargaḥ samāptaḥ //
GK20rmc1-3pu:437: kavīnāṃ kiṃ dattair nṛpapaśubhir anyair avasare paraṃ pṛthvīpālaḥ kṣaṇam api sa karṇo vitaratu /
GK20rmc1-3pu:438: anāttaṃ tattvajñair api suvipulārthavyayabhiyā pratiṣṭhāṃ yenoccair jagati gamitaṃ rāmacaritam //
GK20rmc1-3pu:439: % NB /msC/ reads here (instead of this verse?)
GK20rmc1-3pu:444: atha prabuddhaḥ prathamaṃ vibuddham āsīnam ādāya tadaṅghriyugmam /
GK20rmc1-3pu:445: prakāmanidrābhigamābhirāmo rāmaḥ sumitrāsutam ity uvāca // Rc_3.1 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:446: kim ittham eva kṣapito niśīthaḥ kaccin muhūrārdham asi prasuptaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:447: asmin prasādāvasare dhiyāṃ ca pratiṣṭhitaś cetasi kas tavārthaḥ // Rc_3.2 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:448: vanaukasas tasya naveśvarasya bhāvāvabodhāya punar vimṛśya /
GK20rmc1-3pu:449: yat prāptakālaṃ tad udāharāśu prasthānakālo 'yam atipraśastaḥ // Rc_3.3 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:450: svakāryalābhastimitaḥ kapiś cen na kaścid artho 'nusṛtena tena /
GK20rmc1-3pu:451: ripaūpetaṃ varam arthibhāvād vikārasaṃdehasahe na mitre // Rc_3.4 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:452: kāryāntarāśārahitena tena vyaktaṃ khalenādya vayaṃ nirastāḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:453: dattaḥ pradīrghāgrahaṇābhidhāno yenāyam ārād api no 'rdhacandraḥ // Rc_3.5 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:454: ruddhas tapasvī sa kathaṃ na kaiścin mohāndhakūpe nipatan madāndhaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:455: kiṃ deśakās te 'pi hanūmadādyāḥ sadyaḥ padaṃ prāpya samaṃ vipannāḥ // Rc_3.6 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:456: riṣṭaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ pavamānasūnor na cāgnisūnor na ca vālisūnoḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:457: sarve 'pi kiṃkāraṇam ekadaiva pramītakalpāḥ kapidārakās te // Rc_3.7 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:458: sa durnivāro harir adya śetām āsvāditaiśvaryamadhur madena /
GK20rmc1-3pu:459: kathaṃ punar jāgarakāla eva suptās tadāptā iti me vitarkaḥ // Rc_3.8 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:460: devāt prasūtena himetarāṃśor ūrjasvalais taiḥ sakhibhir vṛtena /
GK20rmc1-3pu:461: udāradehadyutināsmadarthe niranvayaṃ tena tamaḥ prapannam // Rc_3.9 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:462: aho mahan mohajam andhakāraṃ yenādya madhyesabham uddhureṇa /
GK20rmc1-3pu:463: utsārya tān mantrimaṇipradīpān plavaṅgarājaḥ prasabhaṃ gṛhītaḥ // Rc_3.10 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:464: lobhasya mohasya manobhavasya madasya cātiprasaro na ruddhaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:465: ruddhaḥ paraṃ pūrṇamanorathena tenādya naḥ pratyupakāravegaḥ // Rc_3.11 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:466: samrāṭpadasthasya padād apetāḥ samprītaye samprati mā sma bhūmaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:467: dṛṣṭāstrasārā api tasya bhīroḥ kiṃ bhītaye vatsa vayaṃ na bhūtāḥ // Rc_3.12 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:468: sthāne nirastaḥ sudhiyāgrajena sa tena māyāmasṛṇo durātmā /
GK20rmc1-3pu:469: mayā madāndhena punar vṛthaiva kroṣṭā mṛgendrasya pade 'bhiṣiktaḥ // Rc_3.13 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:471: tathāpi dākṣiṇyavilambitavyam idaṃ dhanus taṃ prati māmakīnam // Rc_3.14 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:472: yāvan na viśrāmyati vegajanmā dikṣu dhvanir vālibhidaḥ śarasya /
GK20rmc1-3pu:473: tāvat punas taṅka iha trilokyām ākrāntakiṣkindham upakrameta // Rc_3.15 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:474: asmāsu nāvedayati sma garvāt kurvīta śeṣārivadhaṃ bhujābhyām /
GK20rmc1-3pu:475: vidhāya saurājyam asaūpeyād ity arthitā paśyati na pramāṇam // Rc_3.16 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:476: tad eṣa me nirmalasargasargaḥ ṣaḍvargaruddho ripuvat sa heyaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:477: nāsau niṣiddhas tava yānapakṣo mayā bata prāg asamāhitena // Rc_3.17 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:479: tvāṃ praty asūyāṃ hṛdayena dhāsyaty upasthitāntaḥpuraviprayogaḥ // Rc_3.18 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:482: smariṣyati tvāṃ na sa bodhyamāno 'py ālokayiṣyaty athavā na pṛṣṭaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:484: āvāṃ yadaivādritaṭe niviṣṭau sa kālikāṃ vīkṣya purīṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:485: āmṛṣṭam āsīc capalena tena sauhārdam asmadviṣayaṃ tadaiva // Rc_3.21 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:486: ahaḥsv amīṣu kṣaṇa eva nāsīd āsīn na saṃdeśaharo 'nurūpaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:487: ityādi sa vyaktam alīkam eva tvatprītyupālambhapadeṣu vaktā // Rc_3.22 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:489: prekṣiṣyate roṣalavānuraktaṃ valīmukhaḥ śuṣkamukho mukhaṃ te // Rc_3.23 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:490: tasyāgamād yaḥ sahasā bhaviṣyaty arthasya tasyābhavanaṃ mamāstu /
GK20rmc1-3pu:491: bādhiṣyate vālivadhātiriktas tadveśmayātrānuśayaḥ sadā nau // Rc_3.24 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:492: sa prāktano nūnam anarthabhājā nītas talaṃ tena hitaiṣivargaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:493: utthāpitair dūram asāv idānīṃ divāniśaṃ dīvyati durvidagdhaiḥ // Rc_3.25 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:494: akṣā mṛgākṣyo mṛgayā madhūni prekṣāś ca tasyādya haranti kālam /
GK20rmc1-3pu:495: na prāpnuvanti kṣaṇam āptavācaḥ sadādṛtāś cāraṇacāṭuvādāḥ // Rc_3.26 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:496: vadanti bhītāḥ sacivā na kiṃcit kiṃ cintayāsmadgatayā viṭānām /
GK20rmc1-3pu:497: svayaṃ na sampraty anusaṃdadhāti pūrvāparaṃ kāmaparaḥ sa rājā // Rc_3.27 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:498: na sūrayo na sthavirā na dhīrāḥ puraḥsthitāḥ prāśnikatāṃ prayānti /
GK20rmc1-3pu:499: saṃtiṣṭhate saṃsadi saṃśayānaḥ pṛṣṭhopaviṣṭāsu vilāsinīṣu // Rc_3.28 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:500: itthaṃgate tatra gatasya kena manyus tavodīrṇarayo nivāryaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:501: vicāyamāṇo na guṇāya naḥ syād asau kapīnāṃ kadanānubandhaḥ // Rc_3.29 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:502: prapannaśāṭhyasya haṭhopanāmād āneṣyamāṇasya guṇaṃ na vīkṣe /
GK20rmc1-3pu:503: tathāvidhā hi dviṣatāṃ stavena kaṣanti karṇau param antikasthāḥ // Rc_3.30 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:504: spṛṣ.o na ced vikriyayā kayāpi nopasthitaḥ kāryavaśād idānīm /
GK20rmc1-3pu:505: etu svayaṃ na kriyate vṛthaiva sa tvadbalātkāraniruddhaśobhaḥ // Rc_3.31 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:506: yathāvayos tātajaṭāyuṣoktam uktaṃ kabandhena yathā ca tena /
GK20rmc1-3pu:507: tathopayāsyaty acirād avaśyam āhūtacakro haricakravartī // Rc_3.32 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:508: yat satyam ādityasamudbhavatvād udbhūtim eṣyanti guṇās tadīyāḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:509: tulāgrasampātavilambadoṣe tasmin visaṃvādam ahaṃ na śaṅke // Rc_3.33 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:512: sa nūnam āyāsyati vānarendraḥ saṃdeśakārpaṇyam asaṃmataṃ me /
GK20rmc1-3pu:513: sarvasvabhūtaṃ visṛjanti vatsa kāryātipāte 'pi na dhairyam āryāḥ // Rc_3.35 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:514: vyatītavighnaḥ suhṛdarthanighno na śītalaḥ sthāsyati kiṃ gatena /
GK20rmc1-3pu:515: sa tvaryamāṇas tvaramāṇa eva dhairyasya naḥ pāram avāpsyatīva // Rc_3.36 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:516: dhig astu māṃ taṃ prati vipratīpam āśaṅkitaṃ tad bahu yena yad vā /
GK20rmc1-3pu:517: svakāryadolāsu jano 'lpabhāgyaḥ prāṅ niścinoti vyatirekam eva // Rc_3.37 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:518: itthaṃ na māṃ pratyupapattim eti tatrādyapakṣadvitaye 'pi yātrā /
GK20rmc1-3pu:519: varaṃ visoḍhāni kiyanty apīha saṅkhyātakālābhyadhikāny ahāni // Rc_3.38 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:520: svālocitaṃ vaktu bhavān idānīm ity anuṣṭheyam asaṃśayaṃ yat /
GK20rmc1-3pu:521: bālyāt prabhṛty eva tavottarā dhīr na pūrvapakṣe 'bhiniveśam eti // Rc_3.39 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:522: iti prasannāṃ giram agrajasya śrutvā cirād vītaviṣādapaṅkaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:524: samarthitaṃ sādhu samastam eva kṛtī kapiḥ kiṃ bahunoditena /
GK20rmc1-3pu:525: pravyaktam apy etad adoṣadṛṣṭyā gṛhītam āryeṇa na yat tadāgaḥ // Rc_3.41 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:527: ayaṃ punas tena kuto na jānāmy atikramaḥ kālakṛto na dṛṣṭaḥ // Rc_3.42 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:528: visarjitā vā punarāgamāya samāpatanty adya na te nalādyāḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:529: samāharatiudyatavittavarṣo varṣāntarebhyaḥ pravarān harīn vā // Rc_3.43 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:531: naikābhyupāyopahitān idānīm uta pratīcchaty atisatkriyābhiḥ // Rc_3.44 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:534: atho sa bhītāturabālavṛddhān vṛddhopasevī sanibhaṃ niyuṅkte /
GK20rmc1-3pu:536: tad ittham utthānasamākulatvān na tvaryamāṇo 'pi sa dūṣaṇāya /
GK20rmc1-3pu:537: āryeṇa tatrāpy asamāgatasya chāyācyutiḥ kaiva nirūpitā me // Rc_3.47 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:538: jñeyo 'sti naḥ pūrvam arer udantas tatas tadantāya vidheyam asti /
GK20rmc1-3pu:539: ity ākulatvān mama tāvad ārya kāryopataptiḥ kṣamate na dhairyam // Rc_3.48 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:542: mithaḥ prasādaskhalanād upādher upaiti sakhyaṃ khalayoḥ khilatvam /
GK20rmc1-3pu:543: gṛhṇāti satpūruṣayor na doṣam audāryasaṃvādakṛtā tu maitrī // Rc_3.50 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:544: niryantraṇaṃ yatra na vartitavyaṃ na moditavyaṃ praṇayātivāde /
GK20rmc1-3pu:545: viśaṅkitānyonyabhayaṃ vidūrān namaskriyām arhati sauhṛdaṃ tat // Rc_3.51 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:546: visrabdham ājñāpaya kiṃ karomi kathaṃ ghaṭena plavagādhirājaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:547: yat kiṃcid ādiśya nibhena kiṃ māṃ niṣedhasi kleśam ivekṣamāṇaḥ // Rc_3.52 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:548: sthito 'smi tāvad dinam etad eṣyaty anyedyur ājñāṃ tava na pratīkṣe /
GK20rmc1-3pu:549: āryo 'nurodhān na yunakti yatra tatrāham ambāniyamāt svatantraḥ // Rc_3.53 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:550: tad eṣa niṣkramya tathā karomi tatpūrvasaṅgaḥ plavago yathāśu /
GK20rmc1-3pu:551: taṃ vairisaṃhāramahopakāram āryāya niryātayituṃ yatena // Rc_3.54 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:552: dhik taṃ dhanuṣpāṇim anuplavaṃ māṃ mudhā manaḥparyuṣitāvalepam /
GK20rmc1-3pu:553: anvīkṣate yasya mamāvasādād āryaḥ sahāyāntaram antarajñaḥ // Rc_3.55 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:554: dhikśātatāṃ sannataparvatāṃ dhig dhik pātavegaṃ ca mamāśugānām /
GK20rmc1-3pu:555: alakṣitoddeśam api dviṣantaṃ nihatya nāyānti hi yat kṣaṇena // Rc_3.56 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:556: kharādirakṣaḥkadaneṣu dīrgham amī parijñātarasāḥ kim anyat /
GK20rmc1-3pu:557: asṛgbhujāṃ bhoktum asṛk tvarantāṃ bhūyo 'pi bhūcandra tavārdhacandrāḥ // Rc_3.57 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:561: sa rākṣasebhyo 'mbaragocarebhyas trātas tvayaikena makho maharṣeḥ // Rc_3.59 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:562: taṃ kālakalpaṃ kiyatā śrameṇa tathāvadhīr mārgarudhaṃ virādham /
GK20rmc1-3pu:563: āsan muhūrtāḥ kati ca ghnatas te sainyaṃ janasthānapateḥ svarasya // Rc_3.60 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:564: āsīt kṣuraprasya kiyān vilambaḥ krūreṣu teṣu triśiraḥśiraḥsu /
GK20rmc1-3pu:565: katīṣavo dūṣaṇadehayātrānivāraṇārthaṃ ca raṇe visṛṣṭāḥ // Rc_3.61 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:566: kasyāvalambād akarot parāsuṃ mārīcam uccāvacamāyam āryaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:567: jñātā ca diksaṃjñapitas tvayaiva kṣapācarāṇām adhipaś ca so 'pi // Rc_3.62 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:569: neduḥ stuvānā iva sūnṛtāni khagāḥ kulāyeṣu kṛtaikamatyāḥ // Rc_3.63 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:570: āropya sandhyāṃ diśi vajrapāṇeḥ paryasya candraṃ kakubhi pratīcyām /
GK20rmc1-3pu:571: utsaṅgitoḍuprakarā khagānām ādāya nidrāṃ rajanī jagāma // Rc_3.64 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:572: kaviś ca jīvaś ca sutaś ca bhūmeḥ sa dakṣiṇāśātilako muniś ca /
GK20rmc1-3pu:573: āsannasūryāṃśubhayadrutasya kṣaṇaṃ rarakṣur bhagaṇasya pṛṣṭham // Rc_3.65 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:574: dig darśayāmāsa mukhaṃ sarāgaṃ na yāvad aindrī gaṇikeva mattā /
GK20rmc1-3pu:575: tāvad dvijeśo 'ṅkam iyāya sindhoḥ sandhyāsurāśīkarasekaśaṅkī // Rc_3.66 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:576: visarjitoḍuḥ kṣaṇam indur āsīd āsīd upānteṣv api nāndhakāram /
GK20rmc1-3pu:577: bhṛśaṃ diśīndrasya rarāja sandhyā sindūriṇīva graharājamudrā // Rc_3.67 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:578: uccetum uccair uḍukuḍmalāni vyākurvatī rāgam atipragāḍham /
GK20rmc1-3pu:579: śākhām ivālambya diśaṃ maghonaḥ sandhyā viyad bhūruham āruroha // Rc_3.68 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:581: apy uccakaiḥ pūrvamahīdhramūrdhni sthitvā viyadbhūruham āruroha // Rc_3.69 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:586: tatāna sandhyeti samullasantī nabhoṅgaṇaṃ raṅgavikāradhūliḥ // Rc_3.71 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:588: śanaiḥ śanair mlānaruco mamajjus tārāḥ prasarpaty aruṇe cireṇa // Rc_3.72 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:589: kaiḥ śikṣitā vartayituṃ tadāsīd unmīlitaṃ tūlikayeva citram /
GK20rmc1-3pu:592: babhau visarpaty ayasīva tailaṃ nabhastale bālapataṅgatejaḥ // Rc_3.74 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:593: prasattinirvyūḍhasudhāmayūkhaṃ kham uṣṇaraśmāv api raktim ūhe /
GK20rmc1-3pu:594: bharaṃ pratīcchanti mahodayānāṃ pātrāṇi paryāyavaśaṃvadāni // Rc_3.75 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:595: tāpiñchakalpaḥ kakubhi pratīcyām ācchādayāmāsa mṛgo mṛgāṅkam /
GK20rmc1-3pu:596: dūrādhirūḍhaṃ janam āpadīva prakāśamāno 'tiśayād avarṇaḥ // Rc_3.76 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:600: na bālabhānoḥ kiraṇād abhaiṣīn nadīṣu nīhāramayo 'ndhakāraḥ // Rc_3.78 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:601: tatāra saṃtīrya himāndhakāraṃ tatā rasantī saritaḥ khagālī /
GK20rmc1-3pu:602: raktāravindasya rajobhir ārdrair aktā raviṃ vāriṇi vīkṣamāṇā // Rc_3.79 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:604: vilambya kośeṣu kuśeśayānāṃ sasāra kāsārataraṅgavātaḥ // Rc_3.80 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:605: atītya śaityaṃ taṭavālukānāṃ koṣṇāsu sasnur munayo nadīṣu /
GK20rmc1-3pu:606: apām apūryanta ca nairjharīṇāṃ kuṭā girigrāmakuṭumbinībhiḥ // Rc_3.81 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:608: ibho bhuvi praskhaladagrahastaḥ sasmāra śayyodarakuñjaśayyām // Rc_3.82 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:609: sametya jṛmbhānupadaṃ svayūthyair mithaḥ kṣaṇaṃ līḍhatuṣāralepāḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:610: pratasthire digvalayaṃ vilokya yathāyathaṃ kacchabhuvaḥ kuraṅgāḥ // Rc_3.83 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:611: adṛśyatārāt taralaiḥ sthalīṣu vanecarāṇāṃ pṛtanā kuraṅgaiḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:612: papau raveḥ saṃjvalitograbhāsaṃ bhujaṅgam aughaḥ śritanākurandhraiḥ // Rc_3.84 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:613: sthalaṃ kuraṅgīnayanair anidrair unmuktamudrair jalajair jalaṃ ca /
GK20rmc1-3pu:614: vilolatārais taraladvirephair uvāha bhedaṃ na mithas tadānīm // Rc_3.85 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:616: nirviśya niḥśeṣam aliḥ parāgam agād abaddhaḥ kumudākarebhyaḥ // Rc_3.86 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:617: viveśa gartaṃ gatam uttamohir uccaiḥ padaṃ santatam uttamo hi /
GK20rmc1-3pu:618: āsīn mahaḥ sampadi tuṅgatāyāṃ nabho na kaiścid gadituṃ gatāyām // Rc_3.87 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:619: naiḥsaṅgyam ālambyata kairaveṣu yaiḥ śāntimadbhiḥ śanakaī raveṣu /
GK20rmc1-3pu:620: saujanyam ambhojagṛhe sametaiś cirād dvirephair jagṛhe same taiḥ // Rc_3.88 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:622: vidhor viṣehe virahaḥ kathaṃcin nidrāvalambāt kumudākareṇa // Rc_3.89 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:623: ūhe jalair āhitakoparāgaḥ kṣobhād alnīnāṃ nalinīparāgaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:624: vyasarjayad dyāṃ vivṛtāparāgaḥ śaśī cirād adhyuṣitāparāgaḥ // Rc_3.90 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:625: yathā viluptoḍukadambakāyāṃ bālārkapādair divi dīpyate sma /
GK20rmc1-3pu:626: tathaiva suptākhilakairavāyāṃ raktāravindair abhitaḥ sarasyām // Rc_3.91 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:629: ślathena kecid viviśur mukhena talena kecid dalasaṃhatīnām /
GK20rmc1-3pu:630: madhūtsukānāṃ madhupavrajānām abjeṣu na dvāraviniścayo 'bhūt // Rc_3.93 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:631: luloṭha dhūlīṣu papau madhūni pakṣmāṇi līḍhāni punar lileha /
GK20rmc1-3pu:632: āgantave stokam api dvirephaḥ sthito dadau nāntaram abjamadhye // Rc_3.94 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:633: bheje vinidrāṃ nalinīṃ na kūlān na śīlayāmāsa navārkabhāsam /
GK20rmc1-3pu:634: priyāṃ pratīyāya tathaiva mūḍhāṃ khagaḥ svabodhāgamasābhyasūyaḥ // Rc_3.95 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:635: bahūn asau patrarathas tapasvī cakāra cāṭūn upakaṇṭhalīnaḥ /
GK20rmc1-3pu:636: dṛśaṃ pramīlāpagamāt kaṣāyām unmīlayāmāsa cireṇa cakrī // Rc_3.96 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:638: śrutapriyāhnvānaravaḥ pratasthe sīmantayann abjavanaṃ vinidram // Rc_3.97 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:640: sāpy utsukā tatkṣaṇam ājagāma vilokayantī vanam utpalānām // Rc_3.98 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:641: kurvāṇayoḥ sarasi padmavanāvanaddhe bhinnādhvanor vitatham eva gatāgatāni /
GK20rmc1-3pu:642: saṃvādidikpatitayoḥ patatoḥ kathaṃcid dvandvaṃ cirād ghaṭitam ardhapathe babhūva // Rc_3.99 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:643: vyasmaryatām ṛtamarīcikarābhitāpaḥ prātaḥ patatrimithunais tapanaṃ vilokya /
GK20rmc1-3pu:644: jātyaiva śītalam athoṣṇam alaṃ na kiṃcic citrā gatir jagati jantudaśāvaśena // Rc_3.100 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:646: rāmaḥ prabhātapavanāhitavīcikampāṃ pampām iyāya sarasīṃ saha lakṣmaṇena // Rc_3.101 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:648: susnātaḥ kṛtavidhir añjasopatasthe kākutsthaḥ kanakarasāvadātam arkam // Rc_3.102 //
GK20rmc1-3pu:649: tau dīrghaṃ vidhivad upāsya pūrvasandhyāṃ pūṣṇīṣatprakaṭitaraśmibarbarīke /
GK20rmc1-3pu:651: ity abhinandakavikṛtau rāmacarite mahākāvye mantraviniścayapūrvakaprātaḥssandhyāvarṇano nāma tṛtīyaḥ sargaḥ samāptaḥ //
